8.14.17  9:02 pm   when reading your notebooks page should i read through it like a long book (pretty quick but getting the important details) or really look what each word is doing like if im reading a poem for school. I thought you were the best to ask this to

instructions and guidelines for reading the notes

8.14.17  8:46 pm   bill, someone ask you this:
"i was watching your reality videos (again) an notice that you use the word "we" what do you mean? your family? friends? someone that helps you make your videos?

and then you answer this:

i think i use the words "we" "you" "i" equally. if you happen to know which is the correct pronoun to use when talking to yourself, feel free to let me know.

but the person didn't answer back, so here:

1.- you
that's the word you use when you're talking to someone else, for example, now I'm talking to you, so i'm using the word "you".

2.- we
we is the word that you can use when you are talking about someone else and you, for example, now WE are talking, YOU (bill) and ME (the one that wrote this) but it works with more people; not just two (like now) it can be more.

3.- me
...

this is hard to explain as hell, so here are some examples:

I can't come on tusday, I have homework.

I am going to swim, do YOU (someone) want to come?

It's ME (YOU; bill) do YOU want to come to my house? I just end my homework.

WE (YOU; bill and other people, or just someone else) are going to the carnival, are YOU (someone, or more people that you are talking to) coming?

end of the examples.

ok, those are the examples, I hope it help you, but I (the one that wrote this) don't know if you (bill) were talking about this, or you mean something else.
whatever, bye bill!

8.13.17  10:29 pm   You know, I was thinking: part of the reason it takes a while to process and upload reality videos is because you add graphics and texts to the audio, right?

     Since you mentioned that it would be boring to just hear you speak/ramble on about your life. But, to be honest, I think many of your fans are endlessly fascinated by everything you do, no matter how seemingly inconsequential or boring; so if you ever wanted or needed to, I bet you could release straight audio and we would all be pretty all right with that. Have you ever considered this?
